lender.name: ian and margie
lender.loan_because: it gives me an overwhelming sense of joy and well being and a feeling of being close to someone far away
lender.occupational_info: margie and i play music for old people that are shut in

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a change for the better in someone's life.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I would like to assist people in opening and growing their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I'm chief financial officer for a law firm in California

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide opportunities for others.

lender.name: Modern Printed Matter
lender.loan_because: I'm a small business owner and want to help other people with theirs. The concept of KIVA is brilliant. -Anna
lender.occupational_info: contemporary greeting cards and stationery products

lender.name: Jim Dorey
lender.occupation: I own Internet media & film production companies
lender.loan_because: I am in a good enough position to do so. If the whole world did a similar effort, then clearly we would see a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: I write about the coolest aspect of Hollywood today: 3D movies and entertainment! I also run a cool movie production company that allows me to create what I dream about - can't get better!

lender.name: Lars
lender.loan_because: Help people who needs the money to make or run a buisness to make a decent living.
lender.occupational_info: Working with refugees i Denmark at asylumcenters.

lender.name: Jeff & Sonya
lender.loan_because: As we start our marriage and look forward to building a home and a family, we are eager to lend a hand to struggling families and individuals around the world.

lender.name: PattyMara
lender.loan_because: My brilliant son gave me my first gift certificate for Kiva, and I learned how wonderful it feels to connect with other women in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a potter and painter. I make art that brings a smile and a tear.

lender.name: Kaye
lender.loan_because: It's so easy to help someone who needs it. Because it's God's loving directive that we do so.
lender.occupational_info: I help young people read and grow into the people they want to be.

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: I like to feel connected to other people.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: people loan me money when I need it

lender.name: Brigitte
lender.loan_because: It is a good approach to help and it makes me happy.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: we all need to share.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop medicines.

lender.name: Rumi
lender.loan_because: it is easy, effective, and interactive. When I drink coffee, eat chocolate, or travel to a developing country, I think of people who are behind the scene to make all the things possible for me to enjoy. I want to give something back to them in the most effective way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm interested in conservation and sustainable development. I enjoy trekking in the rainforest.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I hope to increase opportunity for people to succeed and better their communities.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a little fairer and me a little wiser.
lender.occupational_info: I run sales teams at exhibtions (fairs) for other companys,

lender.name: john
lender.occupation: Manage KUER public radio station in Salt Lake City

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I want to help other's by helping themselves to provide a better standard of living.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: There's not enough compassion in the world. The margin of inequality isn't justifiable.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Uschi
lender.loan_because: I think EVERYONE can afford to lend the amount of 25 $ and you can just GIVE soooo much with this... How often do we spend money for worthless and stupid things that we don't need??? It's so much better to invest it here... I think it gives me much more "interest" knowing that I really helped someone than a bank could ever give me in %. I am really GLAD that I found this page after reading an article in a German magazine!
lender.occupational_info: I am working as a secretary and receptionist in a rural hotel on the island of Mallorca.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: our grand parents taught us about giving by the example they set and by their generosity to us. We want to share with others what they have given us. Our grandmother, a widow, age 93 is still an example of caring about others.
lender.occupational_info: There are 5 of us. We do a variety of things -plumbing,entrepreneurial businesses, insurance and long-term care, and professional soccer.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Our class raised funds to lend on Kiva for an active citizen project. The hope is to relend the money over the next 2 years when the students move on from this school.
lender.occupational_info: Science teacher with keen interest in environmental education and social responsiblity.

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer of fictions.

lender.name: Cans For Charity
lender.loan_because: We raise funds for charities through recycling in the business communities.
lender.occupational_info: We promote recycling and education in recycling in the business communities, and use proceeds to donate to charities

lender.name: Ken & Glenda
lender.loan_because: We want to share the blessings that God has given our family with others who are less fortunate and can use these funds to bless the people of the communities in which they live.

lender.name: Cheryl & William
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed with abundance-- we want to share with others. If we can reach out and touch others around the world - we connect to a bigger purpose. God is good!
lender.occupational_info: Cheryl works in a nursing home helping to create a home enviroment. William is a college student.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at Pomona College. I'm studying Environmental Analysis with a minor in Economics.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: God is Love
lender.occupational_info: I find qualified employees for companies.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: Because what goes around comes around. I have been fortunate to have been helped by others when I most needed help so now it's my turn and I couldn't be happier to help!!

lender.name: Kerensa
lender.loan_because: what goes around comes around

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It gives the entrepreneur a better livelihood, a community an enhanced economy, and an individual a global perspective.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student in the Boston area who works with technology innovation for a large insurance company.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate. I respect people trying to do better for themselves. Entrepreneurship has created more prosperity and employment than all the worlds government grants and programs combined. I consider this a privilege to help fledgling entrepreneurships anywhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I own a computer support business with offices in Ottawa and Toronto, Canada.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: Everyone has to start somewhere & this seems to be a good place to make that start.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference with just $25.00!

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: i am able, and helping others in need is awesome!!!
lender.occupational_info: i work for a store that sells building materials

lender.name: Alvin
lender.loan_because: I want to help and hope for a better world.
lender.occupational_info: Corporate Strategy & Business Development

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and I study chemistry

lender.name: Luzi
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance to start a business!

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: of the inspiration of a friend, and our common understanding that every one of us can make a difference in the world. It's a small world after all :)
lender.occupational_info: Day job: I email and fax Asian vendors with info on documentation and shipping of goods. Night job - dream job: Create with paper!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I am convinced that this way will support people to be independant. This possibility to show trust in others will bring trust in my life as well.

lender.name: kaori
lender.loan_because: I gave birth to the girl last year. I felt honorable of the life more by the child's birth.It was felt that some people wanted to be useful, and reached this site at last.

lender.name: Chris and Lis
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us and we want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have the best job in the world. Working at the World Bank one can make a huge difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I can mean something for someone who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I run a practice as an Organizing- and Life Coach.

lender.name: sonja
lender.loan_because: Mein Wunsch ist es die Welt für jemanden, der es nicht so gut getroffen hat wie ich, ein bisschen lebenswerter zu machen

lender.name: Cynthia, Virginia, USA
lender.loan_because: I have been given help in my life and as a Christian I want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I verify the credentials of doctors to make sure they are qualified to practice medicine in our hospital.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want the standard of living in all nations to improve and supporting small business is an excellent way of contributing to this.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance editor for television in Australia.

lender.name: Celine
lender.loan_because: We all want to better ourselves and our families. Sometimes we just need a little help. The men and women shown here are truly amazing, and I am humbled by their success.

lender.name: Zara
lender.loan_because: I believe my surplus money can do a lot more good than sitting in a bank.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I have spent my career teaching students, home economics and cooperative education (work place skills).

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want people to have opportunities to support themselves and their families.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to help developing economies and bring stability to them. I want to see the United States return to greatness and I believe that takes more than sporadically supporting democracy in other countries. I believe that there is no such thing as freedom without economic freedom and there is no such thing as political power without economic power. I love the creativity, guts, drive and independence of the entrepreneurial spirit !
lender.occupational_info: I serve food in a Japanese restaurant. I run back and forth from the kitchen all night running dishes out to the tables and presenting them to guests.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.occupational_info: I help women with anxiety and/or depression feel better and have happier lives.

lender.name: Karalene
lender.loan_because: I try to help people who are not as privileged as me in life.

lender.name: Jehiah
lender.occupational_info: I work at bit.ly helping users share links to websites and track traffic statistics

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: This is the coolest idea!!. I love the idea of helping people start a small business. If someone can get start something that helps their family and community, it is a wonderful thing. My loans are already being paid back.
lender.occupational_info: Entertainment technology.

lender.name: Jesse Plowman
lender.loan_because: The world is what we make it. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I restore and repair wood & log homes.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: Ibelieve people would rather help themselves than be taken care of.
lender.occupational_info: I teach because I believe in enabling people with education.

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.loan_because: it is a good chance supporting people directly. Helps changing the world.

lender.name: Cornelia
lender.loan_because: I believe in female power all over the world. The world became better because of us!

lender.name: Tiger Of Sweden
lender.loan_because: I consider myself being a Philanthropist

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I read Bill Clinton's book, "Giving", and it inspired me to check out this site. The individual stories inspired me to loan!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a university.

lender.name: Ramona
lender.loan_because: I have so much to be grateful for that I'd like to give back what I can.

lender.name: Renate
lender.loan_because: I want to help - and if it's just a little help - and give people a little chance for optimism...

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I want people everywhere to be afforded opportunities to grow and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer and telephone networks. In my free time, I enjoy racing sailboats, reading, and spending time with friends.

lender.name: Comfort Doll Project
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info:
I take photos of bands and musicians, have them autograph an index card, then auction both to their fans... and donate the money.
If you're a band or musician and want to help, contact me via message at my Myspace or email. I"d love to add you to our list of participants..

lender.name: barbara
lender.occupation: Artist - photo is me at age 10
lender.loan_because: I want to give something back from my lucky and rewarding life.

lender.name: Zainab
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and give them hope and Kiva allows me as student to use my small resources to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Law Student.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I recognize it is my human responsibility to help others meet their needs before I indulge in my wants.

lender.name: Moritz
lender.loan_because: i have the power

lender.name: Maryanne
lender.loan_because: My motivation to lend is based on my desire to connect my energy globally with the intention of growth and prosperity for our planet. It is also rooted in an increasing awareness of the financial service needs of the world’s poorest people, and the diverse settings in which they live and work.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find jobs!

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: Small step to make a difference and to support others.

lender.name: Doral
lender.loan_because: I love the people of Pakistan, and my daughter showed me how to use KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: I help farmers manage their water to grow more crops.

lender.name: anna
lender.loan_because: i'm in the wonderful position of being able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: i study literature and critical theory. i write poetry in english and translate poetry from spanish. i teach writing and critical analysis to college students.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe it will help to repair the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a clothing designer.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I am a woman and I believe in the power of women. I think women have the strength and determination to do ANYTHING and if I can help in some small way then I feel more in touch with who I am.

lender.name: Michaela
lender.loan_because: There was a man who was walking along a sandy beach where thousands of starfish had been washed up on the shore. He noticed a boy picking the starfish one by one and throwing them back into the ocean. The man observed the boy for a few minutes and then asked what he was doing. The boy replied that he was returning the starfish to the sea, otherwise they would die. The man asked how saving a few, when so many were doomed, would make any difference whatsoever? The boy picked up a starfish and threw it back into the ocean and said "It made a difference to that one..."

lender.name: Catarina e Nuno
lender.loan_because: I've been down that road too ...

lender.name: Akin
lender.loan_because: Its fun, its fair and it works.
lender.occupational_info: Database Administrator

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I got it, they need it.. they use it, I give it to someone else..
lender.occupational_info: Teaching, directing and coaching

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can and someone needs me to.
lender.occupational_info: I buy buildings and rent them to people and then I buy more.

lender.name: David and Laura
lender.loan_because: we think it is important for people to be able to work on their own, support themselves, and provide for their families. Every person deserves the opportunity to contribute their community and themselves
lender.occupational_info: Public health, HIV/AIDS Outreach, Community development, Social work

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: This is a meaningful way to make a real difference in someone's life.

lender.name: A.Wesley
lender.loan_because: Kiva used to be great fun, now it works like a government program.

lender.name: MISTY
lender.loan_because: We are rich in this country and we need to do something to counteract our country's notions of diplomacy!

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: to make a difference and empower someone else to improve their own life
lender.occupational_info: marketing for a nonprofit organization

lender.name: Derek Tripp
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a lawyer. I care passionately about individual freedoms, specifically rights for gay, lesbian, bisexual, and transgender people.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: we all need help at some time in our life. I have been blessed and want to give back. Just a way to pay it forward! Good luck!!!

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: Much has been given to me and therefore I feel honored to share the same opportunity with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help to maintain an airport where corporate and private aircraft transit.

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I can. If I had not been lucky enough to be born into the family I have in the country where they live, it could be me asking for a microloan.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students with additional support needs in an international school.

lender.name: Rajesh
lender.loan_because: I respect people making effort to come out of poverty shackle

lender.name: Nelly
lender.loan_because: C'est une chance d'aider les autres à entreprendre, partout dans le monde. I'm so happy !

lender.name: Ken
lender.occupation: Real Estate Broker, Entrepreneur, Travel Blogger
lender.loan_because: I want to help, in my own small way, people who are ready to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes and investment properties. www.tinandassociates.com I have a travel blog as well.

lender.name: Bridget
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have an opportunity to better thier lives and quality of living.
lender.occupational_info: I do the mechanical work on locomotives.

lender.name: BENSON
lender.loan_because: I want to start a small bureau business.
lender.occupational_info: Perfect but challenging

lender.name: Silke
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good idea and it helps to give people more independence.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy working at the asset department of a middle-size German insurance company.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: it's a small way to make a difference. I've always been interested in entrepreneurship and believe in supporting those brave enough to start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a clinic that helps patients in their recovery from shoulder surgery. The therapy services help them gain strength and motion .

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I've travelled a lot, and I appreciate how hard a lot of people have to work to put food on the table for themselves and their families. And no, the picture isn't of me, it's a pic that a friend took of a Buddhist monk on the beach when we visited Vietnam a while back. I love that picture...
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, my day is spent working on computers and talking to people on the telephone.

lender.name: Silvia
lender.loan_because: I like to support people who don't give up themselves

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: I run a government website - http://www.businesslink.gov.uk - it explains to UK businesses how to deal with tax law, employment law, other regulations, and how to succeed in business

lender.name: Christopher Scholten
lender.loan_because: It's a tangible way of making a difference
lender.occupational_info: I develop software for a medical instrument that checks patient bodily fluid samples for diseases.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people less fortunate than myself!

lender.name: Sanjeev
lender.loan_because:
As Immanuel Kant said "To be is to do. "
I wish to 'be good', therfore I must 'do good'.
lender.occupational_info: Connecting computers and phones together.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me to be a blessing to others!

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info:
I design the layout and visual look and feel of a website, as well as how the pages work and fit together.
I also work with internet video, filming webcasts and internet broadcasts.

lender.name: Louise and Henry
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to give a hand up.

lender.name: Inyi
lender.loan_because: i inyi godwin 35years old,and my partners wants to loan because my father left six acres of land for me,meanwhile we could make very good usage of the land for cultivation of cashcrops and rearing of animal e.g cattles. we want to loan $1,250 each person.i am from nigeria
lender.occupational_info: we are a farmer of which we study agriculture in school.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I have been poor but that poor was nothing compared to many in this world. I do not have large amounts to give but micro-loans are a perfect way to share. We are all of a people, we should help each other.
lender.occupational_info: It seems my entire life has been controlling "money". I work for the federal government keeping track of monies spent on different programs.

lender.name: jengsheppard
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to learn and grow and succeed; in our world, many people do not yet have that.
lender.occupational_info: Sometimes I work with computers, and sometimes I work by helping people.

lender.name: Dwight
lender.loan_because: I met one of the Kiva founders and heard the Kiva story.

lender.name: Jack Hsiao,Taiwan
lender.loan_because: It's happy to help someone who needs it

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: Because I was lucky to be born where and when I was Because I want to help Because I can
lender.occupational_info: Running a shop and restaurant in the English countryside

lender.name: Madda
lender.loan_because: I think it's one of the most effective way to help needy people full of goodwill.

lender.name: Gill
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should share with one another and try and make life good for all.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to people who have come to live in Wales, so that they can lead full lives and join in, and feel totally at home in the UK.

lender.name: Christopher Andoh
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am the founder of S.E.A. Consulting and Associates. We specialize in developing country Due Diligence, Risk Management, and Analysis.

lender.name: Gert
lender.loan_because: Because I have a good life and others deserve that also.

lender.name: Cooper
lender.loan_because: Obviously, it's the right thing to do. Those of us with some extra money should loan it to the people who could use it. I'm a toddler and I already understand that.
lender.occupational_info: My work is extremely challenging. Aside from my philanthropic pursuits, I spend my days playing, eating, sleeping and reading (or, more accurately, being read to). I am currently attempting to master running, jumping and speaking (albeit not at the same time).

lender.name: Gisela
lender.loan_because: I know from experience how important it is to get help when you start your own business. My respect for all who try this under difficult conditions!
lender.occupational_info: I offer marriage and life guidance.

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: Its cool to help other people! My dad gave me a Kiva account for my birthday to help me learn about micro lending, and how even a young person can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping to repair the world.

lender.name: Kristina
lender.occupational_info: Selling international air tickets

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Kiva provides a simple, easy and very practical way to help others around the world. It can also be a way of saving money for retirement while causing the creation of real value where it is really needed far in excess of the bit of interest foregone.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a public servant, but my vocation is that of helper.

lender.name: Winder & Trina
lender.loan_because: I am lending because I always wanted to help people when I had “the money”, but God is teaching me a great lesson. A big event has occurred in my life which is the opposite of having “the money”. I have lost a lot money in this economy and I am practically starting all over again, but this time with a better foundation “help people first and make money second”. God has touched my wife and my sister in law Karlla in a way that I could have never imagined. Everything start the day that this picture was taken in the estate of Anzoategui, a small town call El Tigrito Venezuela. We took our fist born son, Kianno, to the 7 Day Adventist Church to be dedicated at six months of age in the church where I was baptize as a child. Since that day my wife has been baptized in the 7 Day Adventist Church and now she is to follow God. I am doing my best to keep up with my wife and my sister in law in their faith in God. God bless all the people that are lending and all the people that are receiving the blessing from the lenders. Thanks to Kiva for making this possible. Winder Montaño.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: DavidnLaura
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Conor
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro credit in the fight against global poverty
lender.occupational_info: I work in the finance/accounting area of a financial services company

lender.name: bonnie
lender.loan_because: I looooove People!
lender.occupational_info: Taking care of my family. Love it! Minister's wife.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I believe that money sleeping on a bank account brings is useless compared to what it brings other people that need it.

lender.name: Kati
lender.loan_because: i think that lending is much better than donation!

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Quite simply, it lets me help those who are less fortunate than myself.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: it is a good feeling to help where it is used

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I like to help people less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Teddy
lender.loan_because: I want to help those in need as I once was.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very arduous... requires long hours of patience and diligence.

lender.name: Jocelyn
lender.loan_because: My government gave me a tax break that I did not need, instead of spending it wisely on programs that build human capacity. So I am correcting that!
lender.occupational_info: I help lower-income working families build their first home, through Habitat for Humanity.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part, however small it is, to help others in the world realize their goals and give to others because I have received generous help and support in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student/single mom:)

lender.name: Anna Natasha
lender.loan_because: I believe in solidarity, not charity

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to see entrepreneurs across the world succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I start-up new technology companies.

lender.name: Jeanette
lender.loan_because: I truly belive in what KIVA is accomplishing here ;) great job people!

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I'd like people to make a better life for themselves
lender.occupational_info: Ensuring that systems support the needs of the end users

lender.name: Michaela
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: anna heineke
lender.loan_because: Dit voelt goed

lender.name: Heinz
lender.loan_because: This is a real great idea and project. I am surprised once I found this website and how everything is well and clear organized. Also the legal status is more the perfect. I will immediate use my PR Agency for my books to promote thsi great project.
lender.occupational_info: I am Author, Philsopher. Ex Colonel and twice Consul, Uganda and Angola.

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: It offers me an opportunity to practice what I preach and gives me a heretofore unavailable chance to stand in solidarity with my sisters and brothers - even those half a world away.

lender.name: Nathalie
lender.loan_because: "A poverty-free world would be a world we could all be proud to live in," Muhammad Yunus.
lender.occupational_info:
Film Festival Officer (French Film Festival in NYC Parks - Films on the Green) Webeditor (Mediamerica.org)
Film, TV and New Media Dept of the French Embassy in the US

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I design computer parts for supercomputers.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I love helping others because bringing the best out of others brings out the best out of me
lender.occupational_info:
I'm all about helping young boys maximize their talents and skills. That's why I started a organization called B.L.A.C.M.A.L.E stands for Boldly Leading And Constantly Motivating All Levels of Excellence.
The purpose of the B.L.A.C.M.A.L.E organization is to uplift, empower, and restore the integrity of these young boy transitioning into men.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because:
better that my spare money is put to work helping people in worse circumstances than me improve their livelihood, than spent on beer :)
i work for one international development charity and regularly donate to others, and i am interesting in complementing the charity approach with the loan-based approach.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky enough to live well. I hope to help the hard working people of the world to do the same.
lender.occupational_info:
I help create and finish art for comic books. Mostly, I color line art and add the lettering. It's a bit like taking a sketch from another artist, and then doing a finished painting on top of it.
I also do computer analysis and statistics work for a global food company.

lender.name: Jonathan and Karen
lender.loan_because: We want to give others the opportunities we have had.
lender.occupational_info: We love our dogs, traveling, and golf

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: Together we can change the world
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids ELL students k-12

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to build a sustainable future for their own lives.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I love to help others to achieve their dreams!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to realize their dreams and ambitions.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: ...it’s a simple, direct and compelling means of helping someone help themselves. “If you wish to experience peace, provide peace for another.” The 14th Dalai Lama
lender.occupational_info: I help people to achieve their financial goals.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I like to help others achieve their goals, it's also great to know exactly where my contribution is going.
lender.occupational_info: Contract cleaning

lender.name: webelending
lender.loan_because: I can and it feels good. It's fun. It makes a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Desk work/clerical.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: If I can make a change in someone's life by eating at home instead of dining out just once, why not?
lender.occupational_info: I help people and companies with their computer systems.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I loan because God has blessed me and I want to share with those that could use a helping hand.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have with others.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have difficulty with speech, language, and swallowing.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I desire to help people accomplish their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Supply Management Professional

lender.name: Leonor
lender.occupation: on a mission to make a difference
lender.loan_because: It's a powerful and sustainable way to empower someone right now to lift themselves out of poverty. WE CAN MAKE A DIFFERENCE!! We can partner with God to do what He loves to do : give hope,provision and empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: My life,purpose and work is sharing/educating people about God's grace, love ,compassion and His plans to provide health hope and opportunity for ALL the people of the world.We messed up the food. He came to the rescue once again and revealed an incredible science discovery to do with cellular structure and function and thus cell health. I have been so blessed through this company for my own health and finances that it is now my mission/purpose to empower others especially the impoverished whether in Australia or in the 3rd world countries.If you like to join me in making a difference check out www.icantoo.net/leonor

lender.name: Cassie, Jase, & Kirsten
lender.loan_because: I want to share the importance of compassion with my children and give them exciting opportunities to learn more about other cultures.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves.

lender.name: Tad
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to make a living doing what I would be compelled to do anyway.

lender.name: Josh Devins
lender.loan_because: I can help, so why wouldn't I?

lender.name: Wilson
lender.occupational_info: I sell advertising to companies and raise money for local schools in the process.

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Pangolin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Yie Yin
lender.loan_because: I want to help anyway I can
lender.occupational_info: I am a Grad Student at Sarah Lawrence College, my field of study is Women's History

lender.name: Christian Nipedal
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of the solution. Having been a student with a loan of my own I recognise how fortunate I was. Now even I can help those worse off get on their feet by offering them loans. I have tremendous faith in this initiative and its long-term implications thrill me deeply.

lender.name: Noma & Ash
lender.loan_because:
We believe in empowering others to achieve self-sufficiency.
Instead of giving wedding anniversary gifts to each other annually, we donate to Kiva the sum we would have spent.
266 recipients to date... and counting!
Friends viewing this page who are unfamiliar with Kiva: Please note that the beauty of micro-finance donations is in that your "seed donation money" can be used to help more than the original recipient. Once the short-term loan is paid back into your Kiva account, you can re-loan the money to someone else in need. Unlike other "conventional" forms of charitable donation, this is truly a gift that keeps on giving!

lender.name: Elke
lender.loan_because: It is important to help people to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bank and I think, the percentage of default of kiva is impressive

lender.name: Bettina
lender.occupational_info: waste water business

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: The people I loan to can do more with it than I could here.
lender.occupational_info: I am in public relations. Hoping to do work for a non-profit organization.

lender.name: Maat
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Gill
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the local health service.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I can make a small difference loan by loan.
lender.occupational_info: I take Xrays

lender.name: Gabriella & Mike
lender.loan_because: Gabriella and I have travelled parts of the world and we think it's a necessity to provide others with a chance to improve their lives.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: I want to support entrepreneurs in the developing world in a way that ensures that the money is going directly to them and not being siphoned off by corrupt governments or bureacracy.
lender.occupational_info: Information systems management

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: there are lots of people that need the money more than I do, and I have the responsibility to share my blessings.

lender.name: Uta
lender.loan_because: Its a wonderful idea. People need support for their good ideas.

lender.name: Christoph
lender.loan_because: i think microcredits are one of the reasonable ways to support the creativity and ideas of the borrowers. And this is an effective measure to help them to have a better life.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro financing. I like Kiva because it's person 2 person financing and I choose who gets my loan.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to university students in the Middle East.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I hope this is the best way to end poverty for all
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school teacher. I hope that my students will always try to make the world a better place

We loan because this project feels good. It's a right thing to do!
Try yourself !!

lender.name: Elke
lender.loan_because: In my opinion it is a commitment to all of us in the so called `first` world to help others.

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupational_info: I write and design electronic forms to help people complete their tasks easier and faster.

lender.name: jutta
lender.loan_because: ...it make sense to me.

lender.name: disciple two
lender.loan_because: We are a group of six disciples who want to put God's words into action

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want to pass along that blessing to others. Everyone deserves to have a decent place to live and a way to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a home health care company. I have a son in college and another son in high school.

lender.name: Tracie Evans
lender.loan_because: There is good honest hard working families that need help. Every little bit helps.

lender.occupational_info: My work. tutors

lender.name: Tanja
lender.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear
lender.loan_because: mircofinancing is a great way to encourage economic growth and development in developing countries while helping a living human being.
lender.occupational_info: I analyse chromosomes using a microscope from people with inherited or acquired genetic abnormalities.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my duty to help those those who cannot help themselves, even if it is "only" an animal. The pleasure is in the giving not the receiving. Even abused animals such as my puppymill rescue, Missie, deserve food, protection, and a warm bed for the night.
lender.occupational_info: I supplement my income by selling books on Amazon.ca under the name of BookQuest (Canada).

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good idea to support other persons.

lender.name: J A K
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping out our brothers and sisters across the globe.

lender.name: Unitarian Universalists of Eastport, ME
lender.occupation: caring members and friends of a small congregation

lender.name: Bettine
lender.loan_because: This is a very easy way to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a pharmacy student

lender.name: Yaacov
lender.loan_because: It seems like an easy way to give someone a chance to use their creative spirit to build something they can be proud of.

lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in a wealthy community. The environment is very nice but I have a lot of stress and pressure to do well.

lender.occupational_info: Develop software architecture and manage software projects.

lender.occupational_info: Helping others who have become unemployed discover what their true interests are, then locating viable employment to validate their personal discovery.

lender.name: Gordon
